synopsis.text:
American Dream chasers Noera and Marcia find themselves in an unexpected adventure after a chance encounter leads them to possess a mysterious dark orb. Following a night of heavy drinking, Noera meets Marcia, a fearless biker en route to Los Angeles. Their meeting quickly turns chaotic as they become entangled in a high-speed car chase, resulting in the retrieval of a locked metal box containing the enigmatic sphere.

Upon touching the orb, they experience a shared vision of Death Valley, leading them to believe that the orb must be taken there. As they embark on their journey, they must navigate through the treacherous landscape of California, evading not only rival gangs but also secret government agents who will stop at nothing to retrieve the orb.

The pair soon discovers that the orb is connected to a clandestine U.S.-Soviet space mission, and the government is desperate to cover up any evidence of extraterrestrial contact. With danger lurking at every turn, Noera and Marcia must rely on each other to protect the orb and uncover the truth behind its mysterious power. Little do they know, their quest for the American Dream may lead them to a reality far beyond their wildest imaginations.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
